description.p: OneWare Studio is the next generation IDE for FPGA and microcontroller development.
These are a few of the current features:

ul.li: First class support for VHDL and Verilog out of the box
Easy to use multi vendor support for FPGAs
Builtin support for simulation tools with a lightning fast, multithreaded VCD Viewer
AI generator for easy generation of highly optimized neural networks
Unlock more functionality or add hardware support with extensions

screenshot.caption: AI Generator to create optimized AIs in just a few clicks
Integrated support for simulation using the VCD format and all the popular simulation tools
